title: Dream A Deadly Dream
description: Midnight LoverHe came to her in the dead of night, eerily intimate yet utterly unknown, this stranger she called by name. In her midnight imaginings, he caressed her body, laid claim to her soul, silently whispering of long=ago lives chilled into silence.The Morning AfterThen came the dawn, and her illusory lover appeared at her door, giving life to her darkest fantasies. Kate McCoy was lured to this mysterious man as they shared an ancient love - resurrected in a turn-of-the-century nightmare that overshadowed the present. Could Kate truly trust in their mutual memories, or had this stranger come to her in a timeless passion...only to repeat some tragic, terrifying past?
author: Allie Harrison
